DOC.brief_summary: Health Is Power ( HIP ) community base health intervention design increase physical activity among woman color . It fund grant National Cancer Institute National Institutes Health . The purpose study ( 1 ) determine whether 6 month , group cohesion intervention effective increase physical activity compare 6 month , group cohesion comparison target improve dietary habit ( 2 ) determine whether residence neighborhood supportive physical activity help woman maintain physical activity 6 , ( 3 ) determine whether effect transculturally replicable .
DOC.brief_title: Health Power : An Ecological Theory-based Health Intervention Women Color
DOC.detailed_description: Objective Physical inactivity poor dietary habit plague Americans health challenge , woman color vulnerable detrimental effect . Individually focused intervention demonstrate lasting success , possibly due lack focus sustainable social physical environment factor . Health Is Power ( HIP ) transcultural , community base , randomize control trial investigated effectiveness group cohesion intervention increase physical activity African American Hispanic Latina woman Houston Austin , Texas test whether woman live supportive area maintain physical activity time . Intervention development guide group dynamic principle anchor within ecologic model . Women participate three health assessment six month face face intervention include evidence-based behavioral method - integrated strategy promote group cohesion - frame account environmental factor contribute health disparity . Women participate team building activity , environmental mapping exercise , supervise walk taste test . Neighborhood contextual environmental measure measure test ecologic factor may contribute behavioral maintenance .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : African American Hispanic/ Latina Between age 25 60 year old Able read , speak , write English Spanish Not pregnant plan become pregnant within next 12 month Resident Harris Travis County , Texas Not plan move next 12 month Physically inactive 30 min physical activity per day 3 day per week No history medical illness currently take medication ( could medical waiver physician meet ) Willing randomize either physical activity group vegetable fruit group Available 5:30 8:00 PM meeting date .
